verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:20
verses.text: But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of silver, but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour, and some to dishonour.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:21
verses.text: If a man therefore purge himself from these, he shall be a vessel unto honour, sanctified, and meet for the master’s use, and prepared unto every good work.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:22
verses.text: Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness, faith, charity, peace, with them that call on the Lord out of a pure heart.

verses.name: 2 Timothy 2:23
verses.text: But foolish and unlearned questions avoid, knowing that they do gender strifes.
